org.apache.xmlgraphics.io
Class URIResolverAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.xmlgraphics.io.URIResolverAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceResolver
public class URIResolverAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceResolver

An adapter between URIResolver to ResourceResolver. This adapter allows users to utilize the resolvers from the XML library for resource acquisition.

Constructor Summary
URIResolverAdapter(javax.xml.transform.URIResolver resolver)
